description: A creamy, non-foaming daily cleanser that hydrates as it cleans. This classic formula is clinically proven to provide continuous hydration to protect against dryness while effectively removing dirt, makeup, and impurities without stripping the skin's natural moisture barrier.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a liberal amount to the skin. 2. For use with water: Rinse and pat dry with a soft towel. 3. For use without water: Remove excess with a soft cloth or cotton round.
pro_tip: Great for morning cleansing when your face isn't heavily soiled, or for post-procedure skin that cannot tolerate water.

description: A gentle, gel-to-foam formula designed to deep clean pores and reduce excess oil without drying out the skin. It removes pore-clogging oils, dead skin, and makeup, leaving the skin feeling fresh and balanced.
how_to_use: 1. Massage a small amount onto wet skin. 2. Create a light lather. 3. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
pro_tip: Use this as the second step in a double cleanse if you wear heavy makeup.

description: This cleanser uses Salicylic Acid to gently exfoliate dry, rough, and bumpy skin. It helps promote skin renewal and smoother texture without the harshness of physical scrubs.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to wet skin and massage gently in circular motions. 2. Focus on rough areas. 3. Rinse well.
pro_tip: Start by using 2-3 times a week and build up to daily use to avoid over-exfoliation.

description: A rich cream-to-foam cleanser that transforms from a creamy lather to a soft foam. It cleanses effectively without drying, maintaining the skin's natural pH and microbiome.
key_ingredients: Aloe Vera, Glycerin, Vitamins B3 & B5
how_to_use: 1. Wet face and dispense a pump into hands. 2. Rub hands to create foam. 3. Massage onto face. 4. Rinse.
pro_tip: Ideal for people who love the feeling of a foam wash but have dry skin that usually feels tight after washing.

product_name: Pro Acne Prone Oil Control Foam Wash
description: A deep cleansing foam specifically formulated for acne-prone skin. It helps to wash away excess oil and impurities that clog pores, while soothing ingredients prevent irritation.
how_to_use: 1. Pump foam into hands. 2. Massage onto wet face, avoiding eyes. 3. Rinse thoroughly.
pro_tip: Follow immediately with an oil-free moisturizer to prevent skin from overproducing oil to compensate for dryness.

description: Part of the Bright Healthy Radiance line, this cleanser gently washes away dullness and dead skin cells to reveal a more radiant, luminous complexion. It leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.
how_to_use: 1. Mix with water to create a creamy lather. 2. Massage onto face morning and night. 3. Rinse.
pro_tip: Consistent use is key for brightening products; use morning and night for best results.

description: A lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion that provides long-lasting hydration. It restores the skin's natural moisture barrier in just one week and is clinically proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss.
key_ingredients: Avocado Oil, Vitamin E, Vitamins B3 & B5
how_to_use: 1. Pump desired amount into hands. 2. Apply to face and body as often as needed.
pro_tip: Apply immediately after a shower while skin is still slightly damp to lock in maximum moisture.

description: A rich, non-greasy cream that provides intense 48-hour hydration. It is specifically formulated to help repair the skin's moisture barrier and protect against the 5 signs of skin sensitivity.
key_ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E, Glycerin
how_to_use: 1. Scoop a generous amount. 2. Massage into dry areas of the body or face. 3. Allow to absorb.
pro_tip: Excellent for rough areas like elbows, knees, and heels.

description: Instantly replenishes, hydrates, and protects dry skin for 24 hours. This lotion is clinically proven to moisturize and protect dry skin for a full day with a single application.
how_to_use: 1. Apply daily to dry skin as needed.
pro_tip: Perfect for winter months or arid climates where standard lotions aren't enough.

product_name: Bright Healthy Radiance Night Comfort Cream
description: A skin-brightening night cream that works while you sleep to correct dark spots and uneven skin tone. It replenishes moisture so you wake up with fresh, luminous skin.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to face and neck as the last step of your evening routine.
pro_tip: Don't forget to apply sunscreen the next morning, as brightening ingredients make protecting your progress essential.

description: A clinically proven cream to alleviate the symptoms of atopic dermatitis and eczema. It helps rebuild the skin barrier and provides relief from itchiness and dryness.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally as often as needed or as directed by a physician.
pro_tip: Keep this in the fridge for an extra cooling, soothing effect on itchy flare-ups.

description: A lightweight moisturizer that hydrates for 48 hours while treating acne and preventing future breakouts. It has a matte finish to control shine and blur the appearance of pores.
how_to_use: 1. Cleanse skin thoroughly. 2. Apply a thin layer to the entire face 1-3 times daily.
pro_tip: Because it contains Salicylic Acid, skip other exfoliants in your routine to avoid irritation.

description: A lightweight, high-protection sunscreen gel that absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky residue or white cast. Ideal for daily use on face and body.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. 2. Reapply every 2 hours.
pro_tip: The gel texture makes this an excellent primer under makeup for oily skin types.

description: A 100% mineral sunscreen that reflects UV rays. It provides broad-spectrum protection and is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin types.
how_to_use: 1. Shake well before use. 2. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. 3. Massage in thoroughly to minimize white cast.
pro_tip: Mineral sunscreens work immediately upon application, unlike chemical ones that need time to absorb.

description: A tear-free formula that gently cleanses baby's skin and hair without drying. It leaves a soft fragrance and is hypoallergenic.
how_to_use: 1. Pour into hand or washcloth. 2. Apply to hair and body. 3. Lather, rinse and towel dry.
pro_tip: Gentle enough for adults with hypersensitive skin or rosacea to use as a face wash.

description: A rich, nourishing night cream that helps retain skin's natural moisture, protecting it from dryness throughout the night. It leaves skin feeling smooth, soft, and comfortable.
key_ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid, Olive Extract, Vitamin E
how_to_use: 1. Apply evenly to face at night after cleansing.
pro_tip: Use on damp skin to help the Hyaluronic Acid lock in more water.

description: A daily facial moisturizer with high broad-spectrum SPF 50+ protection. It nourishes the skin while defending against sun damage.
how_to_use: 1. Apply daily to face and neck. 2. Reapply if spending extended time outdoors.
pro_tip: A great 2-in-1 product for minimalists who want moisturizer and sun protection in one step.

product_name: Pro Eczema Prone Skin Restoring Moisturizer
description: A specialized lotion that restores the skin barrier and soothes itchy, eczema-prone skin. It is clinically proven to restore the skin's natural moisture barrier.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally as often as needed.
pro_tip: Apply immediately after bathing to seal in moisture for eczema relief.

description: A gentle baby lotion designed to soothe and nourish delicate baby skin. It contains shea butter to preserve the skin barrier.
how_to_use: 1. Pour lotion into hand. 2. Rub hands together to warm. 3. Gently massage over baby's body.
pro_tip: Warm the lotion in your hands first to avoid startling the baby with cold cream.

description: A potent Vitamin C serum that improves skin radiance and reduces the appearance of dark spots. It defends against surface free radicals.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to clean face in the morning. 2. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen.
pro_tip: Always use sunscreen when using Vitamin C to prevent oxidation on the skin.

description: A lightweight serum that instantly absorbs to deeply replenish skin's hydration for 48 hours. It soothes sensitivity and improves skin quality over time.
key_ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid, Blue Daisy, Vitamin E
how_to_use: 1. Apply morning and night to cleansed skin. 2. Follow with a moisturizer.
pro_tip: The Blue Daisy extract is excellent for soothing sensitive skin redness.

description: Pre-moistened wipes that gently remove makeup and dirt without irritation. They are ultra-soft and perfect for on-the-go cleansing.
how_to_use: 1. Lift seal and remove wipe. 2. Gently wipe over face and eyes. 3. Reseal package tightly.
pro_tip: Use these for the first pass to remove bulk makeup, then follow with a water-based cleanser for a true clean.

description: A gentle facial scrub that exfoliates without over-drying or irritating skin. It removes dirt, oil, and impurities while micro-fine granules buff away dry, dull skin.
key_ingredients: Bamboo Extract, Vitamin B5, Vitamin E
how_to_use: 1. Squeeze a small amount into hands. 2. Massage onto wet face. 3. Rinse.
pro_tip: Gentle enough for daily use, unlike harsh apricot scrubs.

description: Specially formulated for redness-prone skin, this moisturizer provides continuous hydration to reduce the appearance of redness due to dryness overnight.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to face at night after cleansing.
pro_tip: Keep away from hot water when washing your face as heat triggers redness; use lukewarm water instead.

description: A universal formula that combines a comprehensive array of technologies to target multiple signs of aging at once. It improves skin smoothness and targets fine lines and dynamic folds.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops to the entire face in the AM and PM after cleaning.
pro_tip: Do not use in the same routine as direct acids (like Glycolic) or pure Vitamin C to avoid destabilizing the peptides.

description: A gentle cleansing product formulated to target makeup removal while leaving the skin feeling smooth and moisturized. The formula incorporates Squalane alongside other lipophilic esters that are gentle and effective.
how_to_use: 1. Rub product in hands to warm it until it turns to oil. 2. Massage onto dry face. 3. Rinse with warm water.
pro_tip: Rubbing it in your hands first is crucial; if you apply it as a cream, it won't remove makeup as effectively.

description: Found in grains, Azelaic Acid is produced naturally by yeast that lives on normal skin. It brightens the skin tone while visibly improving the evenness of skin texture and reducing the look of blemishes.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to face AM and/or PM to improve visible brightness and the appearance of skin texture.
pro_tip: This creates a matte finish, so it works well as a spot treatment under makeup.

description: A gel-like foaming cleanser that effectively helps remove dirt and environmental impurities. It respects the skin's barrier and improves the look of skin clarity with continued use.
how_to_use: 1. Dispense product into hands. 2. Massage on wet face. 3. Rinse.
pro_tip: This is much gentler than sulfate cleansers; don't expect a massive foam explosion, just a gentle lather.

description: A hydration support formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid. It combines low, medium, and high-molecular weight HA to offer multi-depth hydration.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops to face AM and PM before creams.
pro_tip: Always apply to damp skin. HA needs water to grab onto; if applied to dry skin in a dry climate, it can dry you out further.

description: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion, while Zinc salt balances visible sebum activity.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams.
pro_tip: If you experience pilling (balling up), try patting it into the skin rather than rubbing, or use less product.

description: A water-free solution containing 1% pure Retinol. This potent treatment reduces the appearance of fine lines, photodamage, and general skin aging.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a small amount to face in the PM as part of your skincare regimen. 2. Do not use with other retinoid treatments.
pro_tip: Store in the fridge after opening to keep the Retinol fresh and effective for longer.

description: A water-based serum formulated to target textural irregularities and remove dead skin cells that can clog pores. It helps clear existing blemishes and prevents new ones.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a small dot directly on spots for visible improvement or apply a small amount over the face to maintain visible clarity.
pro_tip: Use sunscreen during the day as Salicylic Acid can increase sun sensitivity.

description: A high-strength peptide formulation which has been shown to reduce the look of static and dynamic wrinkles. It stimulates collagen production for firmer skin.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops to face AM and PM.
pro_tip: A great alternative to Retinol if your skin is too sensitive for retinoids but you want anti-aging benefits.

description: An exceptionally stable solution of Vitamin C that acts directly like Vitamin C. It offers a direct-acting approach to achieving a radiant, healthy-looking skin tone.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops to face AM and PM.
pro_tip: Unlike other Vitamin C serums, this one has an oil-like texture but is water-free; give it a moment to absorb.

description: A pure, lightweight, non-comedogenic oil that provides surface hydration and helps prevent loss of moisture. It can also be used on hair to increase heat protection.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops daily or as needed to entire face ideally after water-based treatments.
pro_tip: Excellent for mixing with a heavy foundation to shear it out and add glow.

description: A surface hydration formula that mimics the skin's natural moisturizing factors. It offers non-greasy hydration and barrier support.
how_to_use: 1. Apply after serums as needed for effective surface hydration.
pro_tip: This has a thicker, almost stiff texture initially but melts instantly into the skin without feeling greasy.

description: A charcoal and clay-infused mask that targets lackluster tone and textural irregularities. It leaves skin feeling refreshed and smooth.
how_to_use: 1. Use once or twice a week on thoroughly clean, dry skin. 2. Leave on for no more than 10 minutes. 3. Rinse thoroughly.
pro_tip: Do not use on wet skin, and do not exceed 10 minutes to avoid chemical burns or irritation.

description: A water-free suspension of 23% L-Ascorbic Acid powder. It provides maximum Vitamin C potency for brightening and anti-aging.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a small amount to face in the AM or PM (PM preferred).
pro_tip: You will feel a strong tingling sensation and a gritty texture; this is normal. Mix with moisturizer to buffer the sting.

description: A concentrated serum with purified Alpha Arbutin to reduce the looks of spots and hyperpigmentation. Supported with HA for enhanced delivery.
how_to_use: 1. Apply a few drops to face in the AM and PM as part of your skincare regimen.
pro_tip: Must be used with sunscreen, otherwise dark spots will just return due to UV exposure.

description: An exfoliating toner that offers mild exfoliation for improved skin radiance and visible clarity. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture with continued use.
how_to_use: 1. Use ideally in the PM, no more frequently than once per day. 2. Saturate a cotton pad and sweep across face and neck.
pro_tip: Also works wonders on rough elbows, knees, or even armpits to reduce odor and brighten skin.

description: A high-strength lactic acid superficial peeling formulation. Lactic acid is a gentler AHA than Glycolic, making this better for those who want exfoliation but have drier skin.
how_to_use: 1. Apply once per day, ideally in the PM.
pro_tip: If 10% is too strong, dilute it with other treatments to reduce strength until your skin adjusts.

description: A light-textured formula containing an extremely high 5% concentration of caffeine, supplemented with highly-purified Epigallocatechin Gallatyl Glucoside (EGCG) from green tea leaves.
how_to_use: 1. Massage a small amount onto the eye contour AM and PM.
pro_tip: This works best on puffiness caused by fluid retention; it won't fix dark circles caused by bone structure or shadow.

product_name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil
description: A daily support formula for all skin types. Rose Hip Seed Oil is rich in linoleic acid, linolenic acid, and pro-vitamin A, making it excellent for anti-aging.
how_to_use: 1. Apply once a day to the face, ideally at bedtime after water-based application.
pro_tip: Known to help with scars and photo-aging marks over time.

description: A non-foaming lotion cleanser that removes dirt and oil without disrupting the skin's natural protective barrier. It contains 3 essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid.
how_to_use: 1. Wet skin with lukewarm water. 2. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. 3. Rinse.
pro_tip: Because it doesn't foam, it might feel like lotion. Trust that it is cleaning your skin!

description: A refreshing gel foaming action that gently cleanses and refreshes skin. It effectively removes excess oil, dirt, and makeup without stripping the skin.
how_to_use: 1. Wet skin with lukewarm water. 2. Massage cleanser into skin. 3. Rinse.
pro_tip: Great for teenagers or those dealing with hormonal oil surges.

description: Designed to improve skin texture while cleansing. The Salicylic Acid exfoliates while ceramides ensure the skin barrier stays intact. Great for "strawberry legs" or rough arms.
how_to_use: 1. Massage onto wet skin. 2. Rinse. 3. Avoid direct contact with eyes.
pro_tip: Leave it on the skin for 60 seconds before rinsing to let the Salicylic Acid penetrate the pores.

description: Begins as a cream to hydrate and transforms into a foam to deep clean. It removes dirt, oil, pollution, and even long-wear makeup.
how_to_use: 1. Wet face. 2. Rub cleanser to create foam. 3. Massage onto face and eye area. 4. Rinse well.
pro_tip: The best "one-step" cleanser if you wear makeup but hate double cleansing.

description: A gel-to-foam cleanser with 2% Salicylic Acid and Hectorite Clay to absorb oil and reduce the appearance of blemishes.
how_to_use: 1. Use morning and evening. 2. Apply to wet hands and massage into skin. 3. Rinse thoroughly.
pro_tip: Can be drying if overused; start with once a day if you have sensitive skin.

description: A rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing cream. It features MVE Delivery Technology to release moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician.
pro_tip: This is thick enough to be used as a body cream but gentle enough for the face.

description: An ultra-lightweight, unique formula that moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier. It is oil-free and non-comedogenic.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally to face and neck at night, or as directed by a physician.
pro_tip: Despite the name "PM", you can use this in the morning if you want a lightweight moisturizer without SPF.

description: A morning multitasker that provides all-day hydration and broad-spectrum sun protection. It helps restore the protective skin barrier.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. 2. Reapply at least every 2 hours if outdoors.
pro_tip: It takes a minute to rub in due to the Zinc Oxide; warm it in your fingers first to reduce the white cast.

description: Encapsulated retinol helps resurface the skin to reduce the appearance of post-acne marks and pores, while Licorice Root Extract brightens the skin's appearance.
key_ingredients: Encapsulated Retinol, Licorice Root Extract, Ceramides
how_to_use: 1. Apply evenly to face daily. 2. Avoid contact with eyes and lips. 3. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
pro_tip: Encapsulated retinol is slower released, making this one of the best "beginner" retinols for sensitive skin.

description: Reduces the look of dark circles and puffiness while restoring the delicate skin barrier around your eyes.
how_to_use: 1. Apply in small dots around the eye area. 2. Gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed.
pro_tip: Use your ring finger to apply, as it applies the least amount of pressure to delicate eye skin.

description: A hydrating, daily acne treatment with 2% salicylic acid that clears acne and helps prevent new breakouts from forming. It also offers gentle exfoliation with AHAs.
key_ingredients: Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid
how_to_use: 1. Cleanse skin thoroughly. 2. Cover the entire affected area with a thin layer one to three times daily.
pro_tip: This is a powerful treatment. Do not layer with other strong acids or retinols immediately to avoid chemical burns.

description: A unique formula that cleanses, hydrates, and comforts without disrupting the skin barrier. It starts as an oil and lathers into a soft foam.
how_to_use: 1. Massage into wet skin. 2. Rinse well.
pro_tip: Perfect for atopic-prone skin or those who find regular foaming cleansers too tight.

description: A lightweight gel-cream that provides hydration while absorbing excess oil for a matte finish. It uses oil-absorbing technology to prevent shine.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally to face and neck.
pro_tip: Acts as a great primer for makeup on oily skin.

description: Provides broad spectrum SPF 50 protection with InVisibleZincâ„¢ Technology (microfine zinc oxide) that spreads easily and dries with a clear finish.
how_to_use: 1. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
pro_tip: This offers higher protection than the standard AM lotion, making it better for summer or intense sun days.

description: Designed to exfoliate, soften, and smooth rough skin while restoring the skin barrier. Ideal for bumpy skin on arms and legs.
how_to_use: 1. Apply to affected areas only or as needed.
pro_tip: Use this in conjunction with the SA Cleanser for faster results on "strawberry legs".

description: Designed to work with your natural circadian rhythm to help restore your skin barrier overnight. It contains biomimetic peptides to improve the appearance of tired skin.
how_to_use: 1. Apply in small dots around the face and smooth gently until absorbed.
pro_tip: This is thicker than the PM Lotion; use it if you need serious anti-aging repair.

description: A potent Vitamin C serum that brightens skin and helps even out skin tone. It is formulated with 10% pure Vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid).
how_to_use: 1. Apply evenly to face and neck daily.
pro_tip: Packaging matters! Keep the cap tight to prevent the Vitamin C from oxidizing and turning brown.

description: Specifically formulated for dry, rough hands. It relieves dryness and helps restore the protective skin barrier.
how_to_use: 1. Apply generously as needed.
pro_tip: Apply a thick layer before bed and wear cotton gloves for an overnight intensive mask.

description: An ultra-gentle cleansing formula that removes dirt, pollution, and makeup without rinsing. It features niacinamide to calm the skin.
how_to_use: 1. Saturate a cotton pad. 2. Wipe gently over face and eyes. 3. No need to rinse.
pro_tip: Use this as a morning cleanse if your water is too hard (high mineral content) which can irritate skin.

description: A petrolatum-based balm that protects and soothes dry, cracked, and chafed skin. It is non-comedogenic and suitable for sensitive skin.
how_to_use: 1. Apply as needed to cracked or dry areas.
pro_tip: Use this for "slugging" (applying a thin layer over your moisturizer at night) to trap moisture in.
